actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deduction for medical expenses shall apply with respect to payments for the medical care of certain relatives of the taxpayer whether or not they are dependents of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the income tax deduction for medical expenses shall apply with respect to payments for the medical care of certain relatives of the taxpayer whether or not they are dependents of the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deduction for medical expenses shall apply with respect to payments for the medical care of certain relatives of the taxpayer whether or not they are dependents of the taxpayer.
